channel.title: Working quest point system delta
channel.description: i added this in my texthandler.java [code]c.sendQuest("Quest points: "+temp.qp+"", 640);[/code] when i compile i get this error [code]:: Preparing for compile... :: Auto-setting envriomental variables... :: :: Scanning for latest JDK version... :: :: Found JDK 1.6.0_07 :: Results: textHandler.java:5: cannot find symbol symbol : variable temp location: class textHandler c.sendQuest("Quest points: "+temp.qp+"", 640); ^ Note: EconomyReset.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error :: Done! Tryk på en vilkårlig tast for at fortsætte . . .[/code] i get an error if i write temp.qp and if i write p.qp and if i write qp

item.title: Working quest point system delta
item.dc:creator: @manmanner manmanner
item.description:
@manmanner wrote:

temp exists on any other file
like on npchandler

temp.saraKills += 1; temp.sM("Saradomin Points: "+temp.saraKills+"");
how do i declare it to texthandler?

item.title: Working quest point system delta
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“liamlod2008, post:2, topic:274575”]try this

c.sendQuest("Quest points: "+temp.qp+"", 277);

Why would you tell him to try that when the variable, ‘temp’, is nonexistent?

item.title: Working quest point system delta
item.dc:creator: @manmanner manmanner
item.description:
@manmanner wrote:

i added this in my texthandler.java

c.sendQuest("Quest points: "+temp.qp+"", 640);

when i compile i get this error

:: Preparing for compile... :: Auto-setting envriomental variables... :: :: Scanning for latest JDK version... :: :: Found JDK 1.6.0_07 :: Results: textHandler.java:5: cannot find symbol symbol : variable temp location: class textHandler c.sendQuest("Quest points: "+temp.qp+"", 640); ^ Note: EconomyReset.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error :: Done! Tryk på en vilkårlig tast for at fortsætte . . .
i get an error if i write temp.qp
and if i write p.qp
and if i write qp

Read full topic
